name: Stone Sword
description: A basic stone sword, crafted from boulders in the nearby mountains.

name: Long Sword
description: Provides greater range and protection as a long iron blade provides intimidation

name: Battle Axe
description: This axe is loyal to its owner, and will return once thrown

name: Horned Slasher
description: This sword is crafted from the horned beasts of the mountains

name: Golden Spear
description: Unlike most swords, the spear provides immense damage if hit right, but leads to vulnerability

name: Excalibur
description: A sword fitted for true royalty

name: Dynastic Shield
description: These shield were created in ancient times, but were lost

name: Volcan
description: Forged from obsidian beneath an active volcano, this sword is said contain flames within

name: Sword of the Mines
description: Forged from the deepest caves, this sword is embedded with sharp gems adding to its potent

name: Wooden Bow
description: A bow crafted from sheep wool and oak logs

name: Hunter's Bow
description: This bow belongs to the fabled hunters of the nearby kingdom

name: Permafrost
description: Arrows forged from unmeltable ice from the polar caps

name: Mangrove's Soul
description: This bow was etched from the ancient mangrove swamps

name: Bow of the trench
description: A common wooden bow infused with the essence of the ocean

name: Starry Night
description: Said to belong to an advanced alien civilization, found near impact craters around the world

name: Poisoned Dart
description: A strange pipe that carrys the most deadly poisons

name: Wind Caller
description: This bow summons powerful winds that extend the power of its arrows

name: Silhouette
description: After tampering with magic, this bow is embedded with dark magic

name: Twig of Wisdom
description: A small staff made from a simple twig, but imbued with the power of wisdom.

name: Thunderbolt
description: A powerful staff that can summon bolts of lightning from the sky.

name: Seer's Staff
description: A staff that allows its wielder to see into the future and glimpse events yet to come.

name: Staff of Shadows
description: A mysterious staff that can conjure darkness and conceal its user in shadow.

name: Sunfire
description: A staff that harnesses the power of the sun to unleash searing rays of heat and light.

name: Frostbite
description: A staff that channels the power of ice and cold to freeze enemies in their tracks.

name: Elemental Staff
description: A staff that can tap into the raw power of the elements - fire, water, air, and earth.

name: Staff of Life
description: A staff that can heal even the gravest of wounds and restore life to the dead.

name: Eye of the Beholder
description: A staff that can charm and control the minds of those who gaze upon it.
